channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: Daniel Evans (actor)
item.description: Daniel Gwyn Evans (born 31 July 1973) is a Welsh actor and director.

item.title: Rico Rodriguez (actor)
item.description: Rico Rodriguez (born July 31, 1998) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Manny Delgado on the ABC sitcom Modern Family (2009–2020). He received several Screen Actors Guild Awards for his performance. He has also appeared in numerous other television shows and movies—both as himself and other characters—before, during, and after the show's run, such as Epic Movie, Endgame, El Americano: The Movie, and Nickelodeon's The Substitute and Unfiltered.

item.title: Don Harvey (actor, born 1960)
item.description: Donald Patrick Harvey II (born May 31, 1960) is an American actor.
